mapper.sql: id, plan_id, plan_task_id, system_id, asset_type_id, struct_detail_id, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by
mapper.select: select distinct t.struct_detail_id, t.asset_type_id, t.system_id, t.plan_id, t1.name as systemName, t2.name as assetTypeName, t3.name as structDetailName, t1.code as systemCode, t2.code as assetTypeCode, t3.code as structDetailCode, t3.struct_type as structDetailStructType from bu_repair_plan_task_equ t left join bu_train_asset_type t1 on t1.id = t.system_id left join bu_train_asset_type t2 on t2.id = t.asset_type_id left join bu_train_structure_detail t3 on t3.id = t.struct_detail_id where t.plan_id = #{planId} order by t1.code, t2.code, t3.code

select t.*, t1.name as systemName, t2.name as assetTypeName, t3.name as structDetailName, t1.code as systemCode, t2.code as assetTypeCode, t3.code as structDetailCode, t3.struct_type as structDetailStructType from bu_repair_plan_task_equ t left join bu_train_asset_type t1 on t1.id = t.system_id left join bu_train_asset_type t2 on t2.id = t.asset_type_id left join bu_train_structure_detail t3 on t3.id = t.struct_detail_id where t.plan_task_id = #{taskId} order by t1.code, t2.code, t3.code
select t.* from bu_repair_plan_task_equ t left join bu_repair_plan_task t1 on t1.id = t.plan_task_id where t1.plan_id = #{planId}
